alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Liberty; McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 5:58PM EDT until August 21 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...LIBERTY AND MCINTOSH COUNTIES... At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Newport, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Jones, Riceboro, Halfmoon Landing, Harris Neck, Shellman Bluff, Retreat, Pine Harbor, South Newport and Sunbury. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 64 and 74. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
